rev.desc.rev.desc: The dropdown lists of "View" are not translated when opening "Search Changes"page
if (index("$", $L.format)>0 or index("jscall(", $L.format)>0 or index("nullsub(", $L.format)>0) then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.format="+$L.format, 11)))

if (not (null($L.inbox.record))) then if (use.normalized in $L.inbox.record=true) then if (normalized.query in $L.inbox.record)#"jscall" then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.tempQuery=str("+normalized.query in $L.inbox.record+")", 11));$L.raw.query=$L.tempQuery) else ($L.raw.query=normalized.query in $L.inbox.record) else if (query in $L.inbox.record)#"jscall" then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.tempQuery=str("+query in $L.inbox.record+")", 11));$L.raw.query=$L.tempQuery) else ($L.raw.query=query in $L.inbox.record)
use scmGetFilesHelper.getPermissionSQL4Inbox jscall to get the sql for inbox
Mobility: The view is not correct. Some OOB view are also listed in the mobile
. change the "set.build.list.query" panel to add the mobility filter
When user has not any view can be showed, give a warning message and logout

descript.descript: The dropdown lists of "View" are not translated when opening "Search Changes"page
if (index("$", $L.format)>0 or index("jscall(", $L.format)>0 or index("nullsub(", $L.format)>0) then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.format="+$L.format, 11)))

if (not (null($L.inbox.record))) then if (use.normalized in $L.inbox.record=true) then if (normalized.query in $L.inbox.record)#"jscall" then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.tempQuery=str("+normalized.query in $L.inbox.record+")", 11));$L.raw.query=$L.tempQuery) else ($L.raw.query=normalized.query in $L.inbox.record) else if (query in $L.inbox.record)#"jscall" then ($L.void=evaluate(parse("$L.tempQuery=str("+query in $L.inbox.record+")", 11));$L.raw.query=$L.tempQuery) else ($L.raw.query=query in $L.inbox.record)
use scmGetFilesHelper.getPermissionSQL4Inbox jscall to get the sql for inbox
Mobility: The view is not correct. Some OOB view are also listed in the mobile
. change the "set.build.list.query" panel to add the mobility filter
When user has not any view can be showed, give a warning message and logout
